Donate Food & Winter Clothes

You can help by donating food, winter clothing, and personal hygiene products at the ICE facility during protests, Monday through Friday.

  • Distribution: Food and clothing are distributed directly to people entering or exiting the ICE facility, including those just released, or given to a local food bank.
  • Best Days: Wednesday through Friday are ideal, but donations are welcome on Monday and Tuesday as well.
  • What to Bring: Shelf-stable food (canned items, pasta sauces, oils, spices, gravies), winter clothing, and personal hygiene products. Please bring items in their original packaging. The greatest current needs are tea, coffee, and cooking oil.
  • Updates: Weekly updates about donations are posted on the Justice 4 All page each Thursday and Friday afternoon. Special needs for items are also posted there.
  • Donate Directly: You can also donate to Toni Matloff via Venmo or with cash.

Anyone is welcome to bring shelf-stable donations on Monday or Tuesday. Your support makes a real difference for people in need!
